channel.title: CVE Feed for ghuger -- Custom Banners
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ghuger -- Custom Banners

item.title: CVE-2021-4407|2024-08-03T17:23:10.739Z -- ghuger -- custom%20banners
item.description: The Custom Banners plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 3.2.2 This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the saveCustomFields() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to save custom fields via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
